note.p: Death: His residence in Crown Street, Westminster, London (08 October 1795)
Education: Academy of Dr Philip Doddridge (1741-1746); DD (Edinburgh)
Career: Pastor, Presbyterian Congregation, Prince's Street, Westminster (1753-1796); edited 2nd edition of Biographica Britannica; funeral sermon preached by Rev Abraham Rees (FRS 1786)
References: William P Griffith, 'Priestley in London' in NR 1983-84 vol 38 pp 1-16
